CHAT.comment: Dear MoM DaD I Love very very much and I Love dad very very much. merry Christmas Happy Chrismas day Love Chi (full name)

see field notes or BR summary for a description of Chi's 20 minutes of refusal to complete the tasks. Once she gets going , though , Chi is very competent. She writes independently , except to ask Mot how to spell merry and Christmas. Mot initiates various conversations with EXP in the background

u.a: EXP initiates conversation about family dog

CHAT.comment: <dollars equal 4> conversation about dog continues in the background

u.a: <$=7> Mot has a short discussion on phone before transferring it to a family member in another room
about a half minute passes in silence and then an exchange occurs between Mot and EXP and Chi's sister about M+and+M's .
MOT initiates conversation about car route to house
MOT initiates conversation with EXPs about snow days in school , and there's some M+and+M related business with Chi's sister
reference to nursery rhyme and to Chi's earlier behavior
